    Reference

    All functions

    borr

    Borrelioositartuntojen jakautuminen Suomessa 2017

    breaks_thl()

    Make axis breaks prettier than default ggplot

    colornames_thl()

    Show THL color names

    colors_thl()

    Generate THL colors by name

    colorset_thl()

    Generate predefined THL color sets

    format_thl()

    Formatting numbers in finnish, swedish and in english format

    geom_col_thl() geom_bar_thl()

    THL wrapper for geom_col()

    geom_line_thl()

    THL wrapper for geom_line()

    geom_point_thl()

    THL wrapper for geom_point()

    is.waiverthl()

    Reports whether x is a waiverthl object.

    logopath()

    Get path to default logo in installed resources path

    palette_thl()

    Generate THL color palette

    plot_colors()

    View colors with a given color hex codes

    plot_line_thl()

    Make a line plot

    plot_palette_thl()

    Plot a THL color palette

    plot_thl_colors()

    View all THL colors, hexacodes and colornames

    resourcePath()

    Get path to installed resources

    scale_x_continuous_thl()

    THL wrapper for scale_x_continuous()

    scale_y_continuous_thl()

    THL wrapper for scale_x_continuous()

    theme_thl()

    THL visual theme using ggplot2

    thlAnnotate()

    Add annotations to the plot

    thlBarPlot()

    Make THL bar plots, vertical and horizontal

    thlColors()

    Generate THL colour palettes

    thlColorsDisplay()

    Display THL colours

    thlGraphs

    thlGraphs: ggplot2 with THL's graphical guidelines

    thlLinePlot()

    Make thlLinePlot

    thlNaLines()

    Linear interpolation of missing values with dotted line in line plots

    thlPlotLogo()

    Insert THL default logo to a plot

    thlPtsConvert()

    Conversion from PostScript points to millimeters

    thlShade()

    Transparent or lighter versions of colors

    thlTheme()

    THL visual theme using ggplot2

    thlYaxisControl()

    Control y-axis limits, big marks and decimal marks

    waiver_thl()

    A THL waiver object.
